item.description:
This is more of an announcement. I know some of you Like Live music but also like playing live music.  Johnny Carlevale ( a good friend of mine and band mate )and Ferris are hosting an open mic at the Midway Cafe in JP..  This promises to be a lot of fun. Whether you are playing or listening.. Haven gone to a lot of open mics myself I have run into some really good talent that I might not have ever seen. Also if you are a novice it is nice to meet others that have the same interest and you tend to learn a lot... So go for it.. check it out.. See for yourself.. Hey you may even get a gig or find  band mates... OPEN MIC NIGHT at The Midway Cafe Public Event · By Johnny Carlevale
    • Monday, May 7, 2012
    • 9:00pm

  • Are you a musician looking to...

    Get some live chops in...

    Try out some new material...

    Or are you a musician who...

    Has never performed live in a real club under the bright lights...

    IT DOESN'T MATTER!

    Beginners or pros the same...come down to The Midway Cafe and perform at our open mic night.

    This is a great opportunity to meet and mingle with other performers and improve on your craft.

    Hosted by Ferris & Johnny!
item.name: OPEN MIC NIGHT @ The Midway Cafe Public Event · By Johnny Carlevale
